programme.title: Quo Vadis TV

programme.title: Full Throttle: The Steve McQueen Story
programme.desc: From troubled childhood and rebellious youth to meteoric rise as a Hollywood superstar, Steve McQueen's story is one of defiance and determination.

programme.title: Melania Trump: A Very Beautiful First Lady
programme.desc: An intimate look at Melania Trump's journey, from her childhood spent in a small Slovenian town to the White House. Learn how she first met \.

programme.title: The Freedom File: Judge Napolitano
programme.desc: Judge Napolitano provides commentary on current events, drawing on his expertise in constitutional law to protect individual freedoms in his legal and political news coverage.

programme.title: First Edition
programme.desc: Start your day with a thorough overview of the latest news, insightful commentary, and expert analysis.

programme.title: The Wendy Bell Show
programme.desc: Conservative. American. Strong. Veteran broadcaster Wendy Bell dives into big news from across America, and around the world.

programme.title: John Bachman Now

programme.title: Salud Total
programme.desc: Métodos para mantener un cuerpo sano, diferentes expertos explican los problemas de salud en el mundo de hoy.

programme.title: Sus Palabras Son Vida
programme.desc: Lectura de diferentes pasajes de la Biblia con la participación del público que sugiere los pasajes bíblicos.

programme.title: Volvamos a la Naturaleza
programme.desc: Música de inspiración combinada con hermosas imágenes.

programme.title: Buenos Días Señor Jesús
programme.desc: Iniciando el día orando y alabando al Señor.

programme.title: Vida en Acción
programme.desc: Rutina de ejercicios fáciles, consejos para una dieta saludable, cómo poner en sus manos su salud a través de la actividad física y vivir bien.

programme.title: Amiguitos de Jesús
programme.desc: Valores morales y espirituales que ayudará a los niños a cultivar un mejor carácter.

programme.title: Ciencia 360
programme.desc: Programa que responde las preguntas que tienen que ver con ciencia y religión, con el ánimo de educar y guiar.

programme.title: 3ABN Hoy Cocina
programme.desc: Recetas fáciles de hacer y saludables, las mejores versiones de platillos tradicionales.

programme.title: Remedios Caseros
programme.desc: Remedios naturales y fáciles para afrontar diferentes condiciones crónicas o degenerativos y enseñar al maneo del un nuevo estilo de vida.

programme.title: El Cristiano Victorioso
programme.desc: Presentado por el Doctor Senez Rodríguez, el ciclo ofrece herramientas prácticas para ayudar a los espectadores a tener una vida victoriosa con Cristo.

programme.title: Conexiones Bíblicas
programme.desc: Diferentes temas que tienen que ver con la Biblia y su comprensión y puesta en contexto, el alcance de su mensaje.

programme.title: Salvación en señales y símbolos
programme.desc: El pastor Carlos Muñoz, el doctor Héctor Delgado y su panel explican de forma sencilla el mensaje, los secretos y el lenguaje.

programme.title: Saúde e Você
programme.desc: Problemas que aquejan a la salud y cómo evitarlos manteniendo una vida sana y tomando medidas de prevención.

programme.title: Espaço Jovem
programme.desc: Conversaciones de jóvenes acerca de diferentes temas cristianos que tienen relación con su vida; su reflexión.

programme.title: Vida en Acción
programme.desc: Rutina de ejercicios fáciles, consejos para una dieta saludable, cómo poner en sus manos su salud a través de la actividad física y vivir bien.

programme.title: Hay Esperanza
programme.desc: Sermones que reflexionan sobre la palabra de Dios, lectura de textos que enseñan lecciones de vida y muestran un camino de luz.

programme.title: Anclas de la Verdad
programme.desc: Un programa con temas muy interesantes sobre las Sagradas Escrituras, llevando el mensaje de Dios.

programme.title: 3ABN Hoy Cocina
programme.desc: Recetas fáciles de hacer y saludables, las mejores versiones de platillos tradicionales.

programme.title: Estrellitas de Jesús
programme.desc: Programa infantil que imparte principios y valores para educar el carácter de los pequeños, se incluyen alabanzas, historias de la Biblia, juegos y aprendizaje de destrezas.

programme.title: Amiguitos de Jesús
programme.desc: Valores morales y espirituales que ayudará a los niños a cultivar un mejor carácter.

programme.title: Seguridad Nacional
programme.desc: La posición de la iglesia adventista sobre los temas de seguridad, los mitos, la verdadera amenaza, cómo protegerse.

programme.title: Camino Verdad y Vida
programme.desc: Conferencias sobre diferentes temas cristianos, las dudas, los designios, la necesidad del encuentro con Dios.

programme.title: Libros del Libro

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: In Abilene, Kan., Marshal Dan Mitchell (Randolph Scott) contends with unruly cattlemen and a group of determined homesteaders intending to settle on government land bordering the town. Hoping to rid the town of the farmers, the cowboys set fire to their camp, and a desperado murders a homesteader, but Dan refuses to allow them revenge. Joining a posse under a crooked sheriff, and with the help of singer Rita (Ann Dvorak) and a merchant, Dan forces a peaceful showdown between the factions.

programme.title: The Desert Trail
programme.desc: John Scott (John Wayne) is a rodeo rider, assisted by his buddy Kansas Charlie (Eddy Chandler). But while the duo is settling a debt with their promoter, Farnsworth (Henry Hall), thieves Pete (Al Ferguson) and Jim (Paul Fix) murder and rob Farnsworth and manage to pin the crimes on John and Charlie. The accused then flee, assume two new identities, take up with a shopkeeper named Anne (Mary Kornman) and set out to clear their names and bring the real killers to justice.

programme.title: Think Big
programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: Biz Kids
programme.desc: "Biz Kids" is an educational television show that teaches financial education and entrepreneurship to a preteen audience. It uses sketch comedy and young actors to explain basic economic concepts.

programme.title: Sports Stars of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Profiles of the top rookie, college and high-school talent in sports; current athletes share their experiences, advice and personal impressions of the road to stardom.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: Lightning Range
programme.desc: Over the course of a single day, a U.S. marshal (Buddy Roosevelt) navigates the trails of the Wild West and attempts to enforce the law. The bandit Black Pete (Olin Francis) makes it difficult for him. But the brave marshal forges on, facing violent outlaws, stagecoach holdups, scams, ambushes, arson and robberies. He even assumes the role of the groom in a hasty marriage ceremony for the lovely Dorothy Horton (Patsy Bellamy), who must be married by noon to claim her inheritance.

programme.title: Shadow Empire

programme.title: Amazing Facts With Doug Batchelor
programme.desc: The first angel of Revelation 14 proclaims a judgment that occurs before Jesus comes in glory; this judgment begins at the end of the longest time prophecy in Scripture-the 2,300 days of Daniel 8:14; Once every case has been decided in the courtroom.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E3 Andrew Henry: Man of His Word Though Andrew Henry has little experience when he partners in a trapping expedition, he pledges his word to complete the risky venture. As Blackfeet warriors close in, he must weigh his personal integrity against the lives of the men he leads.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Nels Stack Story Nels Stack, a war veteran, joins the wagon train. He is now a pacifist who defends against any prejudice. Stack's mild manner leads others to label him a coward. But the tides turn when his kindness gets the train out of dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E19 Man Behind the Badge Van Dorn, a corrupt businessman and the man responsible for the murder of Marshal Sam Cain's wife, comes to Sweetwater. First, he ousts Cain and takes over the town, and then he appoints his gang to be the law enforcement for the town.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E11 Renegades Cheyenne fulfills a dying war hero's wish and helps his son enlist in the Army. Cheyenne arrives at Fort Sumner with Jed Wayne, but trouble soon arises from a demanding colonel and the Comanche Indians' imminent uprising.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Last Trophy A wealthy British couple visits the Ponderosa. The wife soon finds herself attracted to the toughness of the Cartwright men. She begins to think her husband is a coward and sets her sights on attracting Adam.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E29 The Score Is Even Lucas and Mark go on a hunting trip and soon become witnesses to a robbery and murder. Lucas subdues the two robbers, but is severely wounded in the process. Lucas struggles to get the robbers to justice, but devises a plan just in the nick of time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E30 The Mescalero Curse Lucas serves as a jury foreman when a Mescalero Apache Indian is found guilty of murder and is hanged. A Mescalero medicine man places a curse on Lucas. At first Lucas brushes it off, then unusual events begin to happen including a ghost stallion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Friend Zone A shipment from Faith Cattle Company is in jeopardy when the truck gets stuck in a ditch. It's a race against the clock to get the cattle to the buyer or risk losing the deal. Bubba teams up with his father-in-law to build a custom grill prototype in hopes of launching a new business venture. Cody decides to sell a horse to help fund his dream home, but he receives an offer that is less than ideal. After getting relationship advice from Bubba and Cody, Booger ends up on a date with his best friend Ashley.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E5 Is It a Boy or a Girl? Before heading out for the day's work, Bubba notices one of his colts is missing, and the guys go searching for the young horse before it is injured. At the urging of his grandmother, Booger ventures into the world of Internet dating, hoping to find a serious girlfriend. After Bubba's trusted horse gets sick, he asks Booger to help him break in a new colt. Cody and Misty finally find out if they are having a little cowboy or cowgirl, and they plan a party to reveal the gender to friends and family.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial line in the sand. South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this dead line with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial line in the sand. South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this dead line with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the slow

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E1 Kit Carson: Fearless Fighter While coming of age on America's frontier, Kit Carson sets a new standard for steely nerves and fearlessness. But his legend is born when a Native woman is insulted by a notorious bully of the mountains, and Kit challenges the man to a duel to death.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Annie MacGregor Story While on the trail, Annie MacGregor and her Scottish family's wagon wheel breaks. The family patriarch doesn't want any help until Major Adams' wagon train stops. Conflict arises when they practice their traditions, including playing bagpipes.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E21 Gathering Clouds Part 1 As tensions rise between the North and the South, the Army recruits the Kid to infiltrate a band of Southern rebel guerrillas led by a man known as the Hawk.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Empty Gun Cheyenne meets gunslinger Matt Reardon, who rescues him from a fight. Reardon asks for Cheyenne's help as he plans to aid the widow of a man he accidentally killed. However, the dead man's son as other plans for Reardon.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E33 Death Trap Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E34 The Queue A Chinese man named Wang Chi and his son, Wang Lee, come to North Fork to open a laundry service in town. Vince Fergus, a prejudiced man, bullies them but Micah, Lucas, and Milly try to convince them to stay. A fight between Fergus and Lucas ensues.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Vaqueros Mexican bandits attack Lucas and Mark for crossing their desert without paying. The group steals their horses, kidnaps Mark, and leaves Lucas to die in the desert. Lucas gets free and trails the banditos to a small village.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E2 First Wages Against Lucas' wishes, Mark gets a job at the livery stable in town. Lucas has doubts that Mark can both work and get his chores done on time. Mark finds himself in trouble when he takes a shortcut on an errand and meets a dangerous bank robber.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E6 Misty Makes a Match The cowboys are in for a busy week when they're called upon to capture a wild hog that has been getting into a neighbor's garden. They also search a swamp for a calf that goes missing when they move their herd. Cody and Misty get serious about finding a name for their baby boy, so they study their family trees for inspiration. After a disastrous attempt at Internet dating, Booger takes one more shot at dating and agrees to go on a blind date that Misty arranges. Will he finally find a woman that understands the cowboy way of life?

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E7 Frost Moves In Bubba and Cody rush to get their grass planted before the first frost, but they need a bigger tractor to get the job done. Bubba ends up building a horse stall for a neighbor in exchange for the use of his tractor. Booger's relationship with Jaclyn gets serious, and he meets her son for the first time. Cody and Booger rescue a cow from a huge dirt pit, and Cody receives a load of dirt for the foundation of his dream home. Finally, Kaley surprises Bubba with the news that their baby girl is going to arrive sooner than expected.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca's courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy's friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Hunt for Outlaw Bill Doolin When notorious outlaw Bill Doolin escapes from jail, the U.S. Marshals Service springs into action to end his four-year crime spree. Known as the Three Guardsmen, Deputy U.S. Marshals Heck Thomas, Bill Tilghman, and Chris Madsen have a reputation for always getting their man, but they know it won't be easy with Doolin. Doolin is no ordinary outlaw: as a former member of The Dalton Gang and the mastermind of The Wild Bunch, he has successfully robbed banks, trains, and stagecoaches. After months of tracking Doolin, Heck Thomas is so close he barely stops to eat or sleep. When Thomas and his posse finally corner Doolin, he refuses to surrender, and gunfire is the only way out. Some years later, Bat Masterson, former-gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, catches up with Bill Tilghman to hear the real story behind the hunt for the outlaw Bill Doolin.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E4 Marie Dorion: Enduring Frontier Legend Marie Dorion, a member of the Iowa People and mother of two, joins her husband on a harrowing expedition to the Pacific Northwest. Though she endures brutal weather, extreme hunger, and the death of her third child, her worst ordeal still lies ahead.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Flint McCullough Story Flint returns home to Fort Bridger to visit the man who raised him. A run-in with an enemy brings back painful memories of his time in the Confederate Army and the tragedy that ensued after falling in love with Jean Yates, a young Mormon.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E22 Gathering Clouds Part 2 Jimmy joins the Kid in infiltrating the Hawk's gang. Meanwhile, as the Civil War nears, Sweetwater becomes an embattled town as townspeople must take up arms against the renegades.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E13 White Warrior Cheyenne leads a wagon train and goes through Apache territory. Along the way, he meets a band of braves and tries to free a teenage captive from them. However, the young man isn't sure that he wants to be free.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bitter Water When miner Lem Keith plans to buy land next to the Ponderosa, he goes to the owner's son, Todd, who is willing to help Lem because he is in love with Lem's daughter. Plus, they both share a common hatred of the Cartwrights.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sheer Terror Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E4 The Stand-In Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain Ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas refuses since they are taking a murderer named Rudy Croft to be hanged in Yuma. Later, Croft escapes and the guards take Lucas as their prisoner.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E6 Misty Makes a Match The cowboys are in for a busy week when they're called upon to capture a wild hog that has been getting into a neighbor's garden. They also search a swamp for a calf that goes missing when they move their herd. Cody and Misty get serious about finding a name for their baby boy, so they study their family trees for inspiration. After a disastrous attempt at Internet dating, Booger takes one more shot at dating and agrees to go on a blind date that Misty arranges. Will he finally find a woman that understands the cowboy way of life?

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E7 Frost Moves In Bubba and Cody rush to get their grass planted before the first frost, but they need a bigger tractor to get the job done. Bubba ends up building a horse stall for a neighbor in exchange for the use of his tractor. Booger's relationship with Jaclyn gets serious, and he meets her son for the first time. Cody and Booger rescue a cow from a huge dirt pit, and Cody receives a load of dirt for the foundation of his dream home. Finally, Kaley surprises Bubba with the news that their baby girl is going to arrive sooner than expected.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca's courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy's friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Hunt for Outlaw Bill Doolin When notorious outlaw Bill Doolin escapes from jail, the U.S. Marshals Service springs into action to end his four-year crime spree. Known as the Three Guardsmen, Deputy U.S. Marshals Heck Thomas, Bill Tilghman, and Chris Madsen have a reputation for always getting their man, but they know it won't be easy with Doolin. Doolin is no ordinary outlaw: as a former member of The Dalton Gang and the mastermind of The Wild Bunch, he has successfully robbed banks, trains, and stagecoaches. After months of tracking Doolin, Heck Thomas is so close he barely stops to eat or sleep. When Thomas and his posse finally corner Doolin, he refuses to surrender, and gunfire is the only way out. Some years later, Bat Masterson, former-gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, catches up with Bill Tilghman to hear the real story behind the hunt for the outlaw Bill Doolin.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E4 Marie Dorion: Enduring Frontier Legend Marie Dorion, a member of the Iowa People and mother of two, joins her husband on a harrowing expedition to the Pacific Northwest. Though she endures brutal weather, extreme hunger, and the death of her third child, her worst ordeal still lies ahead.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Flint McCullough Story Flint returns home to Fort Bridger to visit the man who raised him. A run-in with an enemy brings back painful memories of his time in the Confederate Army and the tragedy that ensued after falling in love with Jean Yates, a young Mormon.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E22 Gathering Clouds Part 2 Jimmy joins the Kid in infiltrating the Hawk's gang. Meanwhile, as the Civil War nears, Sweetwater becomes an embattled town as townspeople must take up arms against the renegades.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E13 White Warrior Cheyenne leads a wagon train and goes through Apache territory. Along the way, he meets a band of braves and tries to free a teenage captive from them. However, the young man isn't sure that he wants to be free.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bitter Water When miner Lem Keith plans to buy land next to the Ponderosa, he goes to the owner's son, Todd, who is willing to help Lem because he is in love with Lem's daughter. Plus, they both share a common hatred of the Cartwrights.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sheer Terror Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E4 The Stand-In Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain Ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas refuses since they are taking a murderer named Rudy Croft to be hanged in Yuma. Later, Croft escapes and the guards take Lucas as their prisoner.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E5 The Journey Back Mark takes a job on new neighbor Will Temple's ranch but is taken back by Temple's badly scarred face. When a cavalry officer stops by the McCain Ranch looking for a deserter who committed murder, both Mark and Lucas question who Temple really is.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E6 The Decision While repairing a fence on his property, Lucas witnesses a murder. The killer, Corey Hazlett, is the son of a wealthy rancher named Frank Hazlett. When Lucas agrees to testify at Corey's trial, there are threats to harm Mark.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E13 Stagecoach Mary While working as a groundskeeper at a convent in Ohio, former slave Mary Fields forms a deep friendship with the superior, Mother Amadeus Dunne. When Mother Amadeus falls ill after traveling to Montana to open a girls' school, Mary rushes to her rescue and nurses her back to health. Mary soon discovers that the Western Frontier satisfies her free-spirited nature, and she decides to stay in Montana for good. She secures a contract to deliver mail by stagecoach for the U.S. Postal Service, becoming the first African American woman to carry mail. With a fearless attitude and multiple firearms, she protects the mail from would-be bandits and is soon known far and wide. Some years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson meets Sister Amadeus and gets the true story of Stagecoach Mary.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father's death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother's mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler's heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie's husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Steadfast Frontiersman By the 1840s, the fur trade is ending, forcing lifelong frontiersmen like Tom Fitzpatrick to adapt. When he becomes a guide for some of the first Americans to emigrate to California, he faces new dangers even as his way of life is becoming obsolete.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S3 E1 The Malachi Hobart Story Duke scouts a new passage through rough terrain. He meets a traveling preacher named Malachi Hobart during his trip. However, he soon discovers that Hobart is nothing more than a con man. Duke devises a plan to expose him.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: County Line: All In
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked lawyer on the county line forces two neighboring sheriffs to put aside their differences to take down the killer.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E7 Escape to Ponderosa Three deserters escape from an Army stockade and hide at the Ponderosa. When a captain comes looking for them, Ben soon realizes how the prisoners are being treated and resolves to confront his good friend in charge.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Avenger Hoss and Joe desperately look for a way to prevent brothers Adam and Ben from being hanged for a crime. A stranger, Lassiter, comes to town in an attempt to find the truth and prove Adam and Ben's innocence.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E9 Last Shot at the OK Corral In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Bone War It's not gold that inspires a rush of treasure hunters to flood the windblown bluffs of Wyoming: it's bones. After stumbling upon a strange fossil, a man is caught in the crossfire of rival paleontologists warring over a trove of dinosaur bones.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E13 The Bad Penny Four men, who are leading citizens of Calista, receive anonymous mail with death warnings after a beautiful woman named Penelope Piper arrives in town. When the deaths begin to happen, Cheyenne must investigate to uncover the mystery.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Flint McCullough Story Flint returns home to Fort Bridger to visit the man who raised him. A run-in with an enemy brings back painful memories of his time in the Confederate Army and the tragedy that ensued after falling in love with Jean Yates, a young Mormon.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Spiked Rifle Lucas agrees to ride shotgun on a stagecoach carrying $20,000 in gold for North Fork banker John Hamilton after a man fails to show up. When three men rob the stage and take Mark hostage, Lucas must get both the gold and Mark back safely.

programme.title: County Line: All In
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked lawyer on the county line forces two neighboring sheriffs to put aside their differences to take down the killer.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E25 Which Way'd They Go? The Jackman clan must sell their farm to pay back taxes. The Jackmans were not much at farming so they move to a nearby town and take jobs as peace officers. When bank robbers confront them, Lucas must step in and help them deal with the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E17 The Retired Gun Wes Carney, a famous gunfighter, and his new wife Clair move to North Fork. They open a store and settle down. However, three outlaws come to town to challenge him. Carney refuses and they ransack his store, forcing him to put his gunbelt back on.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E18 The Photographer Abel Goss is doing a portrait of Mark standing on a North Fork street. Suddenly he sees Colonel Whiteside and his sidekick, Jamison. When he recognizes them as the cruel men who tortured him in a Civil War prison camp, problems soon arise.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E9 Law Comes to No Man's Land Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E4 Border Showdown Cheyenne and Smitty travel to Mexico to bring a gang of outlaws accused of killing Cheyenne's close friend to justice. However, after they arrive, they discover that the small Mexican town is under the rule of the gang's leader.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, two men have their getaway plan go wrong. When one bandit takes their one remaining horse and rides off with the gold, the other is captured. Years later, the two men face off in a deadly game of deceit and revenge.

programme.title: eSports
programme.desc: Events from the world of e-sports.

programme.title: Beauty and the Bandit
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland) and Chico (Martin Garralaga) secure the deed to a woman's ranch.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: Learn More About Medicare Advantage Plans from Humana
programme.desc: Are you making the most of your Medicare coverage? In this program you will learn about the variety of Humana Medicare plans designed to fit your needs, your lifestyle, and your budget.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes investigates a death and the disappearance of plans for a secret submarine.

programme.title: Double Indemnity
programme.desc: In this classic film noir, insurance salesman Walter Neff (Fred MacMurray) gets roped into a murderous scheme when he falls for the sensual Phyllis Dietrichson (Barbara Stanwyck), who is intent on killing her husband (Tom Powers) and living off the fraudulent accidental death claim. Prompted by the late Mr. Dietrichson's daughter, Lola (Jean Heather), insurance investigator Barton Keyes (Edward G. Robinson) looks into the case, and gradually begins to uncover the sinister truth.

programme.title: The Phenix City Story
programme.desc: Based on a sensational news story, this film looks at the murder of Albert L. Patterson (John McIntire), who hopes to win the an attorney general's job in Alabama. Phenix City is a dangerous place to run for election without the backing of local gangsters, but urged on by his ex-military son, John (Richard Kiley), Albert promises to restore law and order to the crime-ridden city. Though he pays the ultimate price for his bravery, his candidacy inspires residents to stand up to the mobsters.

programme.title: Walk East on Beacon
programme.desc: FBI agent James Belden (George Murphy) is tasked with finding and bringing down a communist spy ring operating in Boston. After an anonymous tip, Belden and his agents tail a man who leads them to various suspects, as they try to determine how far the espionage reaches. Meanwhile, the spies force a scientist (Finlay Currie) to divulge secret information by holding his son hostage. As the investigation continues, it seems the Russian agent Alexi Laschenkov (Karel Stepanek) might be behind it all.

programme.title: A Bullet Is Waiting
programme.desc: Storms trap a Utah sheriff (Stephen McNally) and his prisoner (Rory Calhoun) in a coastal cabin with a professor's daughter (Jean Simmons).

programme.title: Fort Worth
programme.desc: Reformed gunman Ned Britt (Randolph Scott) travels to Fort Worth, Texas, to take over the abandoned newspaper. Crooked trail boss Gabe Clevenger (Ray Teal), a former antagonist of Ned's, challenges him on the trail. Ned refuses to fight -- which disappoints fellow passenger Flora Talbot (Phyllis Thaxter), who had taken a liking to him but now sees him as weak. In Fort Worth, Ned discovers Clevenger is battling the burgeoning railroad and decides to fight back using the power of the press.

programme.title: The Woman in the Window
programme.desc: His family packed off to Maine, Professor Richard Wanley (Edward G. Robinson) is anticipating some quiet time alone. Then he meets Alice (Joan Bennett), the model for a portrait he admires, and can't resist her offer of a drink. No sooner do they get to her place, however, than her jealous boyfriend arrives in a rage. Richard kills him in self-defense, and they decide to hide the body. Things go smoothly until Richard's D.A. friend invites him to tag along on the investigation of his own crime.

programme.title: Johnny O'Clock
programme.desc: When an employee at an illegal gambling den dies suspiciously, her sister, Nancy (Evelyn Keyes), looks into the situation and falls for Johnny O'Clock (Dick Powell), a suave partner in the underground casino. Selfish and non-committal by nature, Johnny slowly begins to return Nancy's affection and decides to run away with her, but conflict within his business threatens their plans. As Johnny tries to distance himself from the casino, his shady past comes back to haunt him.

programme.title: Assignment -- Paris
programme.desc: Cocky investigative reporter Jimmy Race (Dana Andrews) and his idealistic rival, Jeanne Moray (Märta Torén), tangle over international espionage and Cold War tensions in Communist Hungary. While following an explosive story about an accused American spy, Jimmy inadvertently brings the unwanted attention of Hungarian agent Anton Borvitch (Donald Randolph) to Jeanne's ongoing investigation of possible collusion between Hungarian and Yugoslavian politicians, endangering both reporters' lives.

programme.title: The Wyoming Kid

programme.title: The Woman in the Window
programme.desc: His family packed off to Maine, Professor Richard Wanley (Edward G. Robinson) is anticipating some quiet time alone. Then he meets Alice (Joan Bennett), the model for a portrait he admires, and can't resist her offer of a drink. No sooner do they get to her place, however, than her jealous boyfriend arrives in a rage. Richard kills him in self-defense, and they decide to hide the body. Things go smoothly until Richard's D.A. friend invites him to tag along on the investigation of his own crime.

programme.title: Johnny O'Clock
programme.desc: When an employee at an illegal gambling den dies suspiciously, her sister, Nancy (Evelyn Keyes), looks into the situation and falls for Johnny O'Clock (Dick Powell), a suave partner in the underground casino. Selfish and non-committal by nature, Johnny slowly begins to return Nancy's affection and decides to run away with her, but conflict within his business threatens their plans. As Johnny tries to distance himself from the casino, his shady past comes back to haunt him.

programme.title: Assignment -- Paris
programme.desc: Cocky investigative reporter Jimmy Race (Dana Andrews) and his idealistic rival, Jeanne Moray (Märta Torén), tangle over international espionage and Cold War tensions in Communist Hungary. While following an explosive story about an accused American spy, Jimmy inadvertently brings the unwanted attention of Hungarian agent Anton Borvitch (Donald Randolph) to Jeanne's ongoing investigation of possible collusion between Hungarian and Yugoslavian politicians, endangering both reporters' lives.

programme.title: The Wyoming Kid

James finds time to woo the Poet's lovely wife, Ann (Jane Wyman), who initially cold-shoulders him. But, as a romance develops, they partner up to find the robber.

programme.title: Fort Worth
programme.desc: Reformed gunman Ned Britt (Randolph Scott) travels to Fort Worth, Texas, to take over the abandoned newspaper. Crooked trail boss Gabe Clevenger (Ray Teal), a former antagonist of Ned's, challenges him on the trail. Ned refuses to fight -- which disappoints fellow passenger Flora Talbot (Phyllis Thaxter), who had taken a liking to him but now sees him as weak. In Fort Worth, Ned discovers Clevenger is battling the burgeoning railroad and decides to fight back using the power of the press.

programme.title: Gunfighters
programme.desc: In Texas, gunfighter Brazos Kane (Randolph Scott) decides to lay down his guns for good and rides out to visit his best friend -- only to witness his murder. When Brazos takes the body to the nearby ranch of the powerful Banner (Griff Barnett), the rancher accuses him of the murder. Brazos leaves Banner's daughter, Bess (Barbara Britton), a vital piece of evidence in the crime, and then must evade Banner and a crooked sheriff as he reluctantly takes up arms to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Devil's Doorway
programme.desc: Lance Poole (Robert Taylor) is a Native American who left his tribal homelands to fight for the Union in the Civil War. Despite earning the Congressional Medal of Honor for his heroic duties in the line of fire, when he returns home he's still faced with hatred and racism from the white community that neighbors his village. Unable to own property because he's not considered a citizen of the United States, he fights a lawyer's (Louis Calhern) attempts to take over his tribe's hard-earned land.

programme.title: Bad for Each Other
programme.desc: Dr. Tom Owen (Charlton Heston) is an Army doctor on leave to visit his mother, who still lives in the poor Pennsylvania mining town where he grew up. After falling in love with wealthy socialite Helen Curtis (Lizabeth Scott), Tom turns down a position as the local doctor and takes a lucrative job at an elite Pittsburgh clinic. Though he's happy with his newfound success and his recent engagement to Helen, a cave-in at the town mine forces Tom to decide where his heart really lies.

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: When Mildred Pierce's wealthy husband leaves her for another woman, Mildred decides to raise her two daughters on her own. Despite Mildred's financial successes in the restaurant business, her oldest daughter, Veda, resents her mother for degrading their social status. In the midst of a police investigation after the death of her second husband, Mildred must evaluate her own freedom and her complicated relationship with her daughter.

programme.desc: Former gunslinger George Temple (Glenn Ford) wants to keep his gun-fighting days a secret as he builds a new life. It seems whenever Temple's prowess with a gun is discovered, he and his wife, Dora (Jeanne Crain), have to skip town before someone challenges him to a duel. After eventually settling in a small town as a quiet shopkeeper, a drunken Temple makes the mistake of showing off his skills. When the criminal Vinnie Harold (Broderick Crawford) catches wind of it, a showdown is imminent.

programme.title: Devil's Doorway
programme.desc: Lance Poole (Robert Taylor) is a Native American who left his tribal homelands to fight for the Union in the Civil War. Despite earning the Congressional Medal of Honor for his heroic duties in the line of fire, when he returns home he's still faced with hatred and racism from the white community that neighbors his village. Unable to own property because he's not considered a citizen of the United States, he fights a lawyer's (Louis Calhern) attempts to take over his tribe's hard-earned land.

programme.title: Blood on the Moon
programme.desc: Down-and-out cowhand Jim Garry (Robert Mitchum) is asked by his old friend Tate Riling (Robert Preston) to help mediate a cattle dispute. When Garry arrives, however, it soon becomes clear that Riling has not been entirely forthright. Garry uncovers Riling's plot to dupe local rancher John Lufton (Tom Tully) out of a fortune. When Lufton's firecracker of a daughter, Amy (Barbara Bel Geddes), gets involved, Garry must choose between his old loyalties and what he knows to be right.

programme.title: Sirocco
programme.desc: American Harry Smith (Humphrey Bogart) is selling guns to Emir Hassan (Onslow Stevens), whose Syrian rebels are battling occupying French troops. Hoping to stem the fighting, French Col. Feroud (Lee J. Cobb) asks Harry to introduce him to Hassan. Meanwhile, Feroud's girlfriend, Violette (Märta Torén), is increasingly drawn to Harry. While she wants Harry to ferry her out of the dangerous country, he boldly tries to make a profit from his dealings with both Hassan and Feroud.

programme.title: The Garment Jungle
programme.desc: New York garment factory owner Walter Mitchell (Lee J. Cobb) goes the extra, deceitful mile in battling his employees' efforts to unionize. He hires gangster Artie Ravage (Richard Boone) to interfere with the grassroots efforts. After Mitchell's son, Alan (Kerwin Matthews), returns from Europe and befriends one of the union organizers (Robert Loggia), Mitchell eventually tries to mend his unethical ways. Unfortunately, this does not sit well with the violent, vengeful Ravage.

programme.title: Sierra Passage
programme.desc: An orphan turns minstrel-show sharpshooter (Wayne Morris) and aims for his father's killer (Alan Hale Jr.).

programme.title: To the Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: U.S. Treasury Agent Mike Burrows (Dick Powell) witnesses a horrific crime committed aboard the Kira Maru, a Japanese ship. But when justice isn't served, the stubborn investigator decides to get to the bottom of the criminal activity on his own, and begins by tracing the ship to Shanghai. Meanwhile, Burrows becomes entangled with lovely widow Ann Grant (Signe Hasso) and her ward, Shu Pan Wu (Maylia), as he sets out on an international quest to track down ruthless opium smugglers.

programme.title: The Girl from San Lorenzo

programme.title: Blue Steel

Without him, supplies will not reach town, and homesteaders will starve. When town leader Malgrove (Edward Peil) offers to buy the locals out, John and Jake get suspicious, and uncover a land-grabbing conspiracy.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Storm over the Nile
programme.desc: (1955) Drama. Anthony Steel stars as a disgraced soldier who, during the British army's 1898 campaign in Sudan, goes way beyond the call of duty to prove his courage. With Laurence Harvey.

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: (1952) Drama starring Ralph Richardson as a pioneering aviator determined to break the sound barrier, even if it means risking the lives of those closest to him. Directed by David Lean.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: (2015) Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance star in Steven Spielberg's Cold War spy drama. After gaining notoriety for defending a Soviet spy, a US lawyer then tries to free a CIA pilot.

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: (2022) Leaving from Platform 4 - a high octane, Shinkansen-set comedy thriller with Brad Pitt, Joey King and Michael Shannon. A jaded assassin does one last job on a villain-packed train.

programme.title: We're All Going to the World's...
programme.desc: ...Fair: (2021) Jane Schoenbrun's creepy, freaky, coming-of-age horror starring Anna Cobb. A lonely teenage girl gets increasingly sucked into the unnerving nether-world of an online game.

programme.title: Kill List
programme.desc: (2011) Horror. Neil Maskell and Michael Smiley star as friends whose latest job leads them into shockingly brutal, gory violence. With MyAnna Buring and Emma Fryer.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: (1951) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a rancher who's the target of unwelcome harassment by his richer and more powerful neighbour. With Alexander Knox, Joan Leslie and Ellen Drew.

programme.title: San Demetrio, London
programme.desc: (1943) Fact-based drama about a group of Merchant Navy sailors who brave fire and the ocean to save the San Demetrio oil tanker after it's almost destroyed by a German cruiser.

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: (1954) Western starring Dana Andrews. A man falsely accused of murder gets a last-minute reprieve from the lynch mob so he can track down the real culprit.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: (2019) Touching comedy-drama. An ageing golden retriever (voiced by Kevin Costner) tells the story of his life with his best pal, a budding Formula 1 driver.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: (2016) Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer and Janelle Monáe star in the Oscar-nominated, fact-based drama about three women whose genius made a significant contribution to the space race.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: (2020) Vin Diesel stars in this action-packed superhero adventure. After he and his wife are killed, a US soldier is brought back to life and given superhuman powers.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: (2018) Dark sci-fi action with Tom Hardy as Marvel's anti-hero. A reporter becomes inhabited by a ferocious extraterrestrial that has its own ideas on how to behave. With Michelle Williams.

programme.title: Saint Maud
programme.desc: (2019) Psychological horror. After failing to save a life, a nurse transforms her life and vows to save the godless soul of a terminally-ill atheist woman from an eternity with Satan.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Carrington, VC
programme.desc: (1954) Anthony Asquith's vivid and subtle courtroom drama casts David Niven as the eponymous officer accused of stealing army money and going absent without leave.

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: (1957) Second World War thriller. Robert Mitchum stars as the captain of a US destroyer in the North Atlantic hunting down a German U-boat and its world-weary captain, Curt Jurgens.

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: (1954) Western with Robert Mitchum and Marilyn Monroe. An ex-con and a saloon singer steer a raft through hostile territory to face a showdown with her crooked fiancé. With Rory Calhoun.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: (1996) Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy. Arnold Schwarzenegger is on a mission to get his son (Jake Lloyd) the must-have Christmas toy, Turbo Man. But it's sold out everywhere...

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: (1984) Comedy action adventure starring Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. An adventurer helps a bestselling author to search for her sister, who's been kidnapped in Colombia.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: (2019) Action-thriller sequel. Secret agent Mike Banning (Gerard Butler) goes on the run when he's framed for an attack on the President. Can he clear his name?

programme.title: X
programme.desc: (2022) Ti West's acclaimed grindhouse horror with Mia Goth. Some adult filmmakers inexplicably choose a ramshackle house in the Bible-Belt wilderness to shoot a film. It's gonna get nasty.

programme.title: The Innocents
programme.desc: (1961) Classic chiller with Deborah Kerr. A governess finds her two charges worryingly worldly. Are they possessed by spirits? Or is it all in her head? Based on Henry James's story.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: (1998) Charming family comedy sequel. The farm's in trouble and only a sheep-herding pig can save the day. But after a customs mix-up, Babe ends up in a boarding house for lost animals...

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out...
programme.desc: ...of Water: (2015) Surreal animated adventure. When the recipe for Mr Krabs' Krabby Patties vanishes, Bikini Bottom is plunged into anarchy. So SpongeBob sets out to put things right.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: (1990) Classic family comedy starring Macaulay Culkin. A boy's parents forget to take him on holiday with them. Then two inept burglars turn up. Can our resourceful young hero outwit them?

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: (2019) Fun-filled family comedy starring John Cena. A macho fireman has to babysit three impish kids after saving them from a blaze in the remote California woodlands.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: (1998) Elijah Wood and Morgan Freeman star in the sci-fi disaster movie about impending meteorite-related disaster, attempts to destroy it, and possibly some cataclysmic havoc.

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist
programme.desc: (2023) Supernatural horror starring Russell Crowe, loosely based on the memoirs of a 'real' exorcist. A case of demonic possession in Spain connects to dark secrets from the Inquisition.

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: (2022) Ti West's exuberant retro horror and prequel to X. Mia Goth is Pearl - a twisted Dorothy who wants to dance up the yellow brick road to movie stardom. Can a seedy projectionist help?

programme.title: Smile
programme.desc: (2022) Gory horror with Sosie Bacon. Following a traumatic incident, a psychiatrist is haunted by a malevolent, gurning presence that drives people to gruesomely kill themselves. Or is she?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: (1993) Comedy sequel starring Whoopi Goldberg and Lauryn Hill. Deloris - who's now made it big in Vegas - goes back undercover as a teacher to help a struggling school choir find its voice.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: (2016) Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer and Janelle Monáe star in the Oscar-nominated, fact-based drama about three women whose genius made a significant contribution to the space race.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: (2022) Romcom with Julia Roberts and George Clooney. A staggeringly beautiful, divorced couple reunite to stop their daughter's wedding in the staggeringly beautiful surroundings of Bali.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: (2021) Tom Hardy returns as Marvel's gnarly antihero, to face a symbiote spawned from Venom's own blood living inside a serial killer who looks just like Woody Harrelson. Yikes.

programme.desc: In a storied career, Romain Dumas is a two-time 24 Hours of Le Mans winner, WEC champ and multiple ALMS title-winner. But right now, the Frenchman's focus is on a sixth Pikes Peak International Hill Climb victory. Romain joined the RACER Debrief to talk about his all-electric Ford Super Mustang Mach-E, the unique challenge of the Race to the Clouds, and what his perfect racing year would be.
